name: ModifyExperimentHoldout
description:
Update the details of an experiment holdout.

Use this tool to partially update the details of an experiment holdout within a specified project in Datadog.

parameters.name: experiment_holdout_id
parameters.description: The unique integer identifier for the experiment holdout you wish to update.

value_schema.description: A unique integer value identifying this experiment holdout.

parameters.name: target_project_id
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the project you want to access. Retrieve the ID using /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: experiment_holdout_update_data
parameters.description: JSON object containing fields to update in the experiment holdout, such as 'name', 'description', 'filters', 'created_by', etc.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the PostHog API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A unique integer value identifying this experiment holdout.

value_schema.description: A unique integer value identifying this experiment holdout.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
